TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ElementHost extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("WindowsFormsIntegration.Design.ElementHostCodeDomSerializer, WindowsFormsIntegration.Design, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

span.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用放置控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]上您[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制項或表單。Use the control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form. 主機[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，使用項目。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the element. > [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration.dll 隨[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]組件。WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. 組件的預設位置是 %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll。The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. 主機[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]在 Windows Form 中的項目，您必須指派[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素屬性。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the property. 使用要指派自訂之間的對應內容控制項和其裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。Use the property to assign custom mappings between an control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項主機[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 3-D WPF 複合控制項在 Windows Form 中裝載](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

The default is .

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

value.span: 如果裝載的項目有透明背景。否則， 。

span.span: if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓複製點陣圖，這讓裝載使用透明度透過主機容器的項目。The property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container. 透過映像或背景漸層停駐項目時，這非常有用。This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background. 基於效能考量，預設關閉屬性。For performance reasons, the property is turned off by default.

summary.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.

The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一個項目可以裝載，但可以有任意數目的子項目。Only one element can be hosted, but can have any number of child elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定裝載[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 3-D WPF 複合控制項在 Windows Form 中裝載](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableModelessKeyboardInterop(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

param.name: window
param.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

summary.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

span.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以將所有轉送鍵盤訊息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]modelessly 開啟視窗。Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly. 方法安裝中的訊息篩選器[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]為基礎的應用程式。The method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application. 非強制回應視窗是作用中時，篩選會轉送所有鍵盤訊息。The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.

summary.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

span.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
The parent container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主機容器是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ，這是主控項目的父容器。The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , which is the parent container for the hosted element. 在裝載容器永遠是根目錄的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目階層架構。The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy. 若要存取託管的元素的父系，存取直接。To access the parent of the hosted element, access directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnEnabledChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnEnabledChanged (e As EventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: The data for the event.

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.name: e
param.span: A that contains the event data.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作轉送給基底類別實作方法。The implementation of the method forwards to the base class implementation.

span.para: 不會覆寫這項實作方法。控制項管理其託管的項目的繪製和覆寫會導致無法預期的結果。
Do not override this implementation of the method. The control manages the painting of its hosted element, and overriding will cause unpredictable results.

span.span: A that contains information about the control to paint.

summary.span: Paints the background of the control.

span.span: Paints the background of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法到幕後 HBITMAP 繪製父控制項的背景。The method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP. 此點陣圖中裝載的項目背景以用於支援透明度。This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency. 這個方法支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Protected Overrides Function ProcessCmdKey (ByRef msg As Message, keyData As Keys) As Boolean
protected: override bool ProcessCmdKey(System::Windows::Forms::Message % msg, System::Windows::Forms::Keys keyData);

param.name: msg
param.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: One of the values representing the key to process.

span.span: One of the values representing the key to process.

summary.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

span.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果索引鍵的訊息不會處理由主控[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，將它轉寄向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]類別階層處理。If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果索引鍵的訊息不會處理由主控[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目，將它轉寄向上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]類別階層處理。If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

summary.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

span.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

value.span: A對應至上主控的屬性 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 項目。

span.span: A that maps to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技術有兩個類似但不同屬性的模型。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models. *屬性對應*支援兩種架構之間的互通性。*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性翻譯屬性託管的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to translate the property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 使用 ElementHost 控制項的對應屬性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md). [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Select (bool directed, bool forward);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Select(bool directed, bool forward) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Select (directed As Boolean, forward As Boolean)
protected: override void Select(bool directed, bool forward);

param.name: directed
param.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

span.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

param.name: forward
param.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

span.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

summary.span: Activates the hosted element.

span.span: Activates the hosted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動裝載的項目。The method activates the hosted element. 如果裝載的多個項目存在，第一個或最後一個元素就會啟動，取決於`directed`和`forward`參數。If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters. 重複呼叫方法不會周遊託管的項目。Repeated calls to the method do not traverse the hosted elements. 若要選取後續項目，請呼叫方法屬性。To select subsequent elements, call the method on the property. 此實作會將轉送 索引標籤中的索引鍵[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]。This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
